title: Banned for 1st time offense 15 days..
body:
I legit got banned for having two bad games. Yea I inted. my fault

Inted and may have said a few sad things.

But that doesn't constitute a 15 day ban.....

replies.body:
There are four basic punishment tiers:
10 game chat restriction
25 game chat restriction
14 day ban
Permanent ban

Typically you will progress through the tiers in order, however non chat related offences skip straight to the 14 day ban. It wouldn't make very much sense to punish someone for feeding by restricting their chat, and you admitted yourself you were intentionally feeding.

Be aware that the next punishment tier is a permanent ban on your account, so if you offend again you are very likely to lose your account entirely.
